Name: Boogie
Appearance: A 6'8 tall wolf dragon hybrid. He has a short light grey coat with light purple hair, purple eyebrows and fluff on the top of his tail and elbows. His tail is fat and thick being the same thickness as his arms. He has black horns on his head with two red stripes on each. He wears a purple and white hoodie under his black overshirt. His body weight shifts he is either really fat, causing his clothes to ride up his belly (turning his hoodie into a crop-top) and legs and arms to balloon. With rounded puffy cheeks. OR his body is extremely big and buff
Backstory: Boogie, short for Behemoth, doesn't strive for greatness. He bumbles about through life without putting much thought into most things. His body is unique and holds this special property that makes him gain and lose weight in rapid speeds. When you see him hes either really buff or extremely obese. He constantly eats food to compensate. Boogie was born October 5th 1999. He doesn't have a job, and lacks most skills other than, cooking, yelling, and working out
Personality: A lazy over the top glutton with an apatite that never seems to be satisfied. He can get hot headed at times and even pretty violent, especially when food is on the line. Boogie is a slob and doesn't hide it, he's known to spread his body around the couch with junk food closing in on every direction.
Likes_Dislikes: Likes: Food, sleeping, cooking, yelling, video games. Dislikes: working out (does it anyway), being hungry, being called names, being teased about his weight
